shortIntro.title: What This Game Needs to Run Smoothly
shortIntro.para1: Solo Leveling: ARISE is a visually stunning action RPG based on the globally popular manhwa series. Because of its high-quality animations, fast combat effects, and detailed character models, the game requires a capable device to run smoothly without stuttering.
shortIntro.para2: Low-end devices can still play the game at reduced graphics, while mid-range and flagship phones deliver a smooth 45–60 FPS experience, especially during boss battles and dungeon runs.

intro: Below are the official and community-tested minimum and recommended specifications required to run Solo Leveling: ARISE smoothly on Android devices.

minimum.CPU: Snapdragon 660 / Helio G70 / Kirin 710 or equivalent
minimum.Internet: Stable 4G connection required for online features

recommended.Internet: Low-ping 4G/5G or Wi-Fi for seamless gameplay

faqIntroText: Here are the most commonly asked questions about Solo Leveling: ARISE performance and compatibility.

faqList.question: Can Solo Leveling: ARISE run on 3GB RAM phones?
faqList.answer: Yes, but only on low graphics with reduced effects.

faqList.question: Does the game support 60 FPS?
faqList.answer: Yes, 60 FPS is available on mid-range and flagship devices.

faqList.question: Why is the game heating my phone?
faqList.answer: The game has high-quality visual effects. Reduce shadows, skill effects, and resolution to control temperature.
